p: Fatty acids within the series are biosynthetically related, being synthesized through enzymatic processes of desaturation, chain elongation, and chain shortening [ 146]. Particularly, the biosynthesis of ω-3 and ω-6 PUFA starts from α-linolenic acid (ALA or linolenate; 9,12,15–18:2) and linoleic acid (LA or linoleate; 9,12–18:2), respectively ( Figure 6).
